content: As an AI language model, I do not have a fixed opinion, but generally speaking, performance evaluations should be conducted at regular intervals to ensure that employees are receiving feedback and opportunities for growth and development. The frequency of performance evaluations may depend on various factors such as the size of the organization, the nature of the job or role, and the company policy. Some organizations conduct evaluations annually, while others prefer to do it quarterly or bi-annually. It's important to maintain a consistent schedule to keep employees informed and engaged in the process. However, the most important thing is to ensure that regular communication and feedback are provided to employees throughout the year, regardless of whether formal evaluations are conducted.
